metricsystem.button.name: Metric
metricsystem.window.name: Metric System Converter
metricsystem.window.distance.name: Item Range Converter
metricsystem.window.weight.name: Item Weight Converter
metricsystem.settings.disableBttn.name: Disable Converter Button
metricsystem.settings.disableBttn.hint: Disables the Metric System Converter button on top of actor sheets. When enabled, only ASSISTANT GM users or above can see it.
metricsystem.settings.enableWeight.name: Enable Weight in Kilograms
metricsystem.settings.enableWeight.hint: If enabled, changes the label 'lbs.' to 'kg', adjusts the encumbrance formula to use kilograms and enables the Weight Converter. (Changing will reload the application)
metricsystem.converter.distance.descript: Choose below the items, features and spells of your character that you wish to convert. You can choose to convert to the metric system (meters/kilometers) or to the imperial system (feet/miles).
metricsystem.converter.weight.descriptio: Choose below the items of your character that you wish to convert. You can choose to convert to kilograms or to pounds.
metricsystem.converter.emphasis: The new numerical value of the item's attribute persists even if you disable this module. It's advised to write down the original values in case mistakes are made. You can always convert backwards or change the value manually in the item.
metricsystem.converter.distance.header.n: Character Items with Range or Target
metricsystem.converter.footer.title: Select a Measurement System:
metricsystem.converter.distance.option: Replace the units but don't convert the values
